Highlights.name: Industry-Embedded Learning
Highlights.description: Mentogram offers industry-embedded learning programs [1]. This means that their programs are designed to give you the skills and experience you need to succeed in the real world. The programs are developed in collaboration with industry professionals, so you can be sure that you are learning the latest in-demand skills.

Highlights.name: Bridging the Skills Gap
Highlights.description: Mentogram helps to bridge the gap between what is taught in academia and what is required in the workplace [1]. Their programs are taught by experienced practitioners who can provide you with real-world insights and guidance.

Highlights.name: Comprehensive Learning Platform
Highlights.description: Mentogram's platform offers a variety of features to support your learning, such as mentor-mentee matching, peer-to-peer networking, learning pathways, and Zoom integration [1]. This means that you can connect with mentors and peers, track your progress, and learn at your own pace.

enhanced_description: Mentogram is a Mentor-led Workforce Accelerator designed to make education and career advancement accessible. It partners with universities to launch accelerator-style degrees and certification programs for students, and with corporates to drive engagement, retention, and address critical skill gaps in areas like Business Education, Gen AI, Digital Skills, and Soft Skills. Its comprehensive platform supports personalized upskilling pathways, tokenized gamification, mentoring circles, a networking corner, and AI-driven career assessments. Emphasizing industry-embedded learning, Mentogram bridges the gap between academic knowledge and workplace requirements, offering ready-to-deploy mentorship program templates and leadership training centered on mentoring and coaching skills to build a future-ready workforce.
